contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown:
Join your fellow Kentico experts, enthusiasts, or anyone who wants to learn about Kentico in downtown Milwaukee, WI for the Milwaukee Kentico User Group.
:::note Date: Thursday, May 30, 2024
Time: 5:00 PM to 7:00 PM CDT
Location: Aloft Milwaukee Downtown 1230 N Doctor M.L.K. Jr Dr · Milwaukee, WI :::
On May 30th, guest speakers from [Lightburn](https://lightburn.co/) will share a project story that pushed Kentico 13's data and customization boundaries. From app to web to product, developers faced unique navigational challenges that influenced asset management and end-user journeys.
Register for the event and see [all the details on Meetup.com](https://www.meetup.com/mkekug/events/300804888).
If you would like to see a Kentico user group start in your area, [let us know](https://community.kentico.com/#gridsection-feedback).
